name: Nomads St Kilda
description:
Welcome to Nomads St Kilda - the perfect location for you to see all of what Melbourne has to offer. Just 5 minutes from the beach, a short walk to the bustling cafes and bars of Acland street and just a short tram ride to access all the 'must-do' sites in and around Melbourne CBD. Nomads St Kilda has everything you need for your Melbourne experience!

From shared rooms to Private Balcony Deluxe spaces (we can boast about all our rooms having their very own ensuite and split system air con) there is something for everyone, all overseen by our friendly 24 hour reception team. The reception desk operates all day every day and you will even be able to message them through the Goki app with any questions or queries you have :)

Our on site bar, Red Eye Bar; Home to the famous Big Willy's Bingo every Monday night. - is the perfect spot for you to take part in our nightly event schedule with some of the best events in Melbourne. Enjoy a bite to eat or some free pool whilst spending time meeting like-minded people looking to make friends and have a good time. A nightly event schedule keeps things interesting with events such as interactive Trivia’s and Silent Disco’s to ensure a social environment is always our focus!

So whatever it is, you may be looking for - a short fun getaway; a great base to enjoy Melbourne from, somewhere to meet new friends or just a comfy place to rest - you’ll find it with us in St Kilda. We look forward to hosting you and saying G'day!

18+ Hostel - Valid Passport needed on check in
hostelworldSays: Base St Kilda is a spacious and modern backpackers' hostel located just five minutes from Luna Park and the beach. There are also two stops outside with lines going directly to the centre of Melbourne. Hostelworld guests tell us this hostel has a friendly party atmosphere and helpful staff who provide nightly themes, parties and games in the lively onsite bar. We like that all their rooms are ensuite.
hostelSays:
We offer a lot of great extras, like free pancake nights every Monday and free BBQ nights every Wednesday. Plus, every guest gets a free drink on arrival and every room is ensuite. 
We're  located a few hundred metres from the iconic St Kilda Beach, and is a stone's throw from the historic Acland Street shopping precinct. At the same time, we are only a short tram ride from the city centre or Chapel Street shopping districts and a 10-minute walk to the Fitzroy Street nightlife district. Personally I love the walk along St Kilda Pier at sunset, where you get the very best spectacular view of the Melbourne City Skyline as well as of the cute St Kilda Penguins on the pier rocks.
I think we present a welcoming environment for guests of all ages, though, being a youth hostel, we do cater to the backpacker market. Having said that, we very regularly have mature-age guests staying with us who very much enjoying their time here in St Kilda.
We are very wheelchair friendly and have an onsite lift as well as rooms which are equipped for special needs guests in both 4 bed rooms and private rooms. Only a handful of these rooms are available so we do need prior notice to ensure availability.

groupInformation.additionalTerms: No groups available from October - March

houseRules.notes:
Nonrefundable or last minute bookings are non cancelable, non exchangeable and non refundable whatever the reason for the cancellation. The total of the amount of the stay is debited from your card once the booking is received.

Standard or flexible bookings can be Canceled or changed free of charge prior to 3pm on the day before your arrival date. The total of the amount of the stay will be debited from your card within 24 hours of your arrival date.

If the property is unable to charge the full amount to your nominated card we will attempt to contact the customer asking for an alternative payment method. If this is unsuccessful it may result cancellation.

Credit card payments to Hostels in Australia and New Zealand are subject to a transaction fee. The current fee is 2.19 % of the total transaction for Visa, 2.18 % for Mastercard, and 3.95 % for American Express. Fees may change and are confirmed at the time a charge is made.

This property does not accept any bookings for Schoolies, Hens or Bucks parties

This property does not accept the storage or charging of E-Bike batteries on the premises.

This property considers a group to consist of 5 or more people travelling together - regardless of whether bookings are made collectively or individually. To minimise impacts to other guests, and to ensure you are adhering to our group policies it is recommended that you contact the property directly to make group bookings. Failure to do so may result in additional fees, requirements to pay for additional beds and we may notbe able to guarantee beds are allocated into the same room - if it is felt that your group may impact the experience of other guests it may result in the cancellation of your reservation with full charges.

This property is an 18+ venue & Valid Passport is needed for shared room accommodation

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
